column4: BRIEF-Vonage Holdings says partnered with Microsoft
column5: * Vonage Holdings Corp- partnered with Microsoft to launch a connector to Microsoft's suite of workflow automation tools Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

column4: UPDATE 3-Gigamon shares jump as activist investor Elliott takes stake
column5: May 8 Shares in network software company Gigamon Inc jumped as much as 20 percent on Monday after activist investor Elliott Management reported a 15.3 percent stake and said it would speak to management about undergoing a "strategic review process."
